hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# All builtin echo "CONFIG_MODULES=n" > kernel/configs/builtin.config
# Build for arm64 ARCH=arm64 CROSS_COMPILE=aarch64-linux-gnu- make defconfig kvm_guest.config builtin.config ARCH=arm64 CROSS_COMPILE=aarch64-linux-gnu- make Image.gz vmlinux -j$(nproc) cp .config arch/arm64/boot/config
# Build for X86_64, well maybe we are not on x86_64 host, fixme... make defconfig kvm_guest.config builtin.config make bzImage vmlinux -j$(nproc) cp .config arch/x86_64/boot/config

# Publish kernel_version=$(make kernelversion) scp arch/arm64/boot/Image.gz loic.poulain@people.linaro.org:~/public_html/linux/Image-${kernel_version}-aarch64.gz scp arch/x86_64/boot/bzImage loic.poulain@people.linaro.org:~/public_html/linux/bzImage-${kernel_version}-x86_64
scp arch/arm64/boot/config loic.poulain@people.linaro.org:~/public_html/linux/config-${kernel_version}-aarch64 scp arch/x86_64/boot/config loic.poulain@people.linaro.org:~/public_html/linux/config-${kernel_version}-x86_64
#scp arch/arm64/boot/vmlinux loic.poulain@people.linaro.org:~/public_html/linux/vmlinux-${kernel_version}-aarch64 #scp arch/x86_64/boot/vmlinux loic.poulain@people.linaro.org:~/public_html/linux/vmlinux-${kernel_version}-x86_64
